Package ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHoster
    Interface which all host-classes have to implement
    IHosterURLAdder
    Interface which a host-classes can implement, but it is not needed.
    IHostURLCheckerListener
    Listener for the Adder-Panel to detect when the URLs are parsed or to update the Progressbar.
    IRedirect
    Interface which all redirect-classes have to implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassesLoaderTool
    Classloader for the host- and redirect-classes
    Host
    Class which all hostclasses have to extend
    HostClassesLoader
    Classloader for the hostclasses, which does some checks if the hostclass is ok.
    Hoster
    Host and Rule extends this class, so we have a class which could be a Host or a Rule.
    HostManager
    Class which holds the host-classes and provides methods to check and parse the URLs There is also a method which removes duplicates from an URL-Array
    HostRules
    Host-Class for Rules
    HostSortImages
    Host-class for images that are on the harddisk and should be sorted.
    HostURLChecker
    This class is for checking multiple URLs
    HostzDefaultFiles
    Host-Klasse fuer beliebige Dateien und speziell fuer Bilder die nicht auf einem Image-Hoster gehostet sind.
    HostzDefaultFilesOptionsDialog
    HostzDefaultFilesOptionsDialog
    Redirect
    Class which all redirectclasses have to extend
    RedirectClassesLoader
    Classloader for Redirectclasses
    RedirectManager
    Class which holds the redirect-classes
    RemoveDuplicatesThread  
    URLParseObject
    This class is used as arguments for parsing the urls
